local Tool = script.Parent local Gun = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer

local shards
local damage = 20
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function blow(hit) local humanoid if hit and hit.Parent then if hit.Parent.className == "Hat" and hit.Parent.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") else humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid and myHumanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end end
function fire() shardFire = Tool:FindFirstChild("ShardFire") if shardFire and shardFire.Value == 1 then Tool.Enabled = false local orbGunSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("OrbGunSound") if orbGunSound then orbGunSound:Play() end if vCharacter == nil or myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end shards = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Shards") if shards == nil then return end local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint
if shards:FindFirstChild("ShardWeld") then
shards.ShardWeld:Remove() end
if shards:FindFirstChild("FirePart") then damage = 45 else damage = 25 end
local direction = (target - shards.Position).unit
local float = Instance.new("BodyForce") --Fix implemented by Luckymaxer float.force = direction * shards:GetMass() * 196.20 * 10 float.Parent = shards
shards.CFrame = CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) * CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0,0,0), direction) + shards.Position
shards.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 15)
debris:AddItem(shards, 4) shards.Touched:connect(blow)
wait(5.0) Tool.Enabled = true shardFire.Value = 0 end end
function onEquipped() local resizeGun = true vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local children = vCharacter:GetChildren() for i = 1, #children do if children[i].className == "CharacterMesh" and children[i].BodyPart == "RightArm" then resizeGun = false end end print(resizeGun) if resizeGun then Gun.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) end end

local Tool = script.Parent local Gun = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local gunSound
game:GetService("ContentProvider"):Preload("http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=61844654") game:GetService("ContentProvider"):Preload("http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=61910181")
local mouseDown = false
local shard = Instance.new("Part") shard.FormFactor = 3 shard.Size = Vector3.new(1.2, 2.5, 1.2) shard.CanCollide = false
local shardMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") shardMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=61910181" shardMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=61838880" shardMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(2.5, 2.5, 2.5) shardMesh.Parent = shard
local firePart = Instance.new("Part") firePart.FormFactor = 3 firePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) firePart.Transparency = 0.9 firePart.CanCollide = false
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Color = Color3.new(0.1, 0.1, 0.9) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0.8, 0.1, 0.9) fire.Size = 1.0 fire.Heat = 0.1 fire.Parent = firePart
local shardClone local shardWeld
local shardFire
function chargeShards() local countTimer = 1 local rotationSpeedUp = 1 local theta
if vCharacter == nil or myTorso == nil then return end shardFire = Tool:FindFirstChild("ShardFire") if not shardFire then return end if shardFire.Value == 1 then return end
mouseDown = true
shardClone = shard:Clone() shardClone.Parent = vCharacter shardClone.Name = "Shards"
shardWeld = Instance.new("Weld") shardWeld.Part0 = Gun shardWeld.Part1 = shardClone shardWeld.Name = "ShardWeld" shardWeld.Parent = shardClone shardWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, -2, 0.5)) local initCFrame = shardWeld.C1
local weldC = Tool:FindFirstChild("WeldC") if weldC then weldC.Value = initCFrame end
print(initCFrame) print(shardWeld.C1)
while mouseDown == true do if shardWeld then if countTimer%10 == 0 then if rotationSpeedUp < 8 then rotationSpeedUp = rotationSpeedUp + 1 if rotationSpeedUp == 8 then local f = firePart:Clone() f.Name = "FirePart" f.Parent = shardClone
local w = Instance.new("Weld") w.Part0 = shardClone w.Part1 = f w.Parent = shardClone end end end theta = countTimer%6 * math.pi/3 * rotationSpeedUp/8 shardWeld.C1 = initCFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, theta, 0) countTimer = countTimer + 1 end wait() end end
function releaseShards() if mouseDown then shardFire = Tool:FindFirstChild("ShardFire") if shardFire and shardFire.Value == 0 then shardFire.Value = 1 end mouseDown = false end end
function onEquipped(mouse) Gun.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=61844654" vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if mouse then mouse.Button1Down:connect(chargeShards) mouse.Button1Up:connect(releaseShards) end end
function onUnequipped() if gunSound then gunSound:Stop() end Gun.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=61838856" end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
